block3.h3: Thousands of users trust Whalio to learn AI. Get the tools, skills, and confidemce to grow in your career.

list.title: Quick and easy follow
list.description: Learn AI in just 15 minutes a day—perfect for any age or experience level.

list.title: Multiple learning formats
list.description: Choose from audio lessons, step-by-step guides, and interactive courses to suit your style.

list.title: Accessible anytime, anywhere
list.description: Our app is available on both the App Store and Play Market for learning on the go.

list.title: Practical and actionable
list.description: Gain hands-on experience with our AI tools which you can apply immediately to increase income-potential.

block4.h3: Explore different paths where you could apply AI that will help you succeed in today’s digital world.

items.title: Ai income
items.description: Learn to use AI tools to create new income streams and grow your earnings online

items.title: AI-powered business
items.description: Use tools to automate workflows, analyze data, and make smarter decisions that save time and money

items.title: AI Content Creation
items.description: Quickly produce high-quality content for blogs, websites, and social media with AI

items.title: AI-productivity
items.description: Somplify your daily tasks with AI tools that save time and increase efficiency

items.title: AI affiliate marketing
items.description: Use AI to find products, promotions, and increase affiliate earnings easily

items.title: AI-marketing
items.description: Learn how to increase sales with AI-driven tools for ads, social media, and more...

block6.h3: Learn at your own pace and discover how AI and digital tools can help you grow

items.title: Step 1: Get your personal learning plan
items.description: You begin by defining your unique goals and needs. From there, a personalized learning plan is created to help you focus on the most relevant skills and tools, ensuring you stay on track and motivated.

items.title: Step 2: Learn the skills you need
items.description: Our easy-to-follow lessons will guide you through practical, hands-on learning. You’ll master the AI tools and other skills that fit your goals, making learning simple and efficient—without overwhelming you.

items.title: Step 3: Master AI for your goals
items.description: Once you’ve learned the basics, you’ll dive deeper into applying AI to achieve your personal and professional objectives. With each skill mastered, you’ll gain the confidence to use AI to boost your productivity, income, and success.

plan.title: Your Plan is Ready!
plan.description: Let’s dive into the steps you’ll take to become an AI expert and integrate these powerful tools into your daily life.
plan.name: AI Mastery

block8.h2: Earn a certificate that proves your AI skills
block8.p: Complete your AI course to highlight your expertise. It’s proof of the valuable skills you’ve gained to tackle challenges, achieve your goals, and move forward in your career or personal projects.

items.text: As someone knowledgeable in AI, I sought to enhance my understanding of using AI for income sources. Coursiv simplified this journey with its clear and easy follow courses. I gained a lot of knowledge, and Coursiv brought attention to several key points that I had previously missed.
items.name: Regina Brown

items.text: I have been searching for AI lessons to help me reach my career objectives. I decided to invest in Coursiv, and I have no regrets about that choice. Coursiv offers prompts and a step-by-step teaching approach that motivates and rewards the learning experience.
items.name: Amanda K.

items.text: I gained valuable insights and practical skills that I can apply in my own work. The course promotes interactive learning, enabling you to practice what you've learned through hands-on activities.
items.name: Corey Rein

block10.h2: Learn new AI every day in our 29-day Challenge
block10.h3: Don’t let your goals overwhelm you. Learn AI skills tailored to your needs and everyday tasks.
